name: EpicFacts
0:
”Alexa, open epic facts”
”Tell me an epic fact”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: epic facts
des: Epic facts will tell you some of the unbelievable epic facts that seem fake but are true. This skill has a range of epic facts and tells you a new epic fact every time. Try this to know amazing facts.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
